Articles.Content:
This challenge is for new Kerbonauts.

Description:

You must land on mun.

Rules:

Use only allowed mods.

Kethane mod allowed.

No mechjeb.

It must be your own rocket.

If you crashed but survived,you can't try it again.

If you land(NOT CRASH!)you must do a EVA.

You must do a pictures and upload them.

Allowed mods:

Kethane Mod.

Mechanical Mouse Industries Satelite Pack.

All rover mods allowed.

Empty command pods allowed.

Scoring:

Crashed but survived(non rescued)-50

Crashed but survived(succesfully rescued)-100

Landed without enought fuel to get back-150

Landed with enought fuel to get back-300

Bonus Score:

Re-entry landing 500 km from KSC(Kerbal Space Center)-100

Re-entry landing in water-100

Touchdown 1 m/s.-100

Deploy a probe-200

Deploy a rover-300

Land near a munolith-200

Land ON munolith-500

Powered landing-500

Using a 3-man pod-400

Do a timelapse of your mission-500

Medals:

Bronze-300

Silver-500

Gold-1000

Good luck
